name: Maximus Punch (Dev name)
description:
A prototype for members of King Bit Games Discord

Punch and Punch your way through an endless wave of enemies.
How long can you survive?

WASD - Movement
Left/Right Click - Left/Right Punch

Grey box = Any Hand
Pink = Left Punch
Orange = Right Punch

Tells what you think of the game in our Discord: https://discord.gg/SztB2hB
